Name: Swift of Thunder VI
Desc:
[Fusion Skill] Mir, while using Dragon Swift, responds to Evan's magic and crashes into five different points on the ground, drawing a pentagram of lightning. Swift of Thunder does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
This skill is activated when Evan casts Circle of Thunder while Mir is using Dragon Swift.
Required Skill: Swift of Thunder Lv. 20 or higher

Desc.Old:
[Fusion Skill] Mir, while using Dragon Swift, responds to Evan's magic and crashes into five different points on the ground, drawing a pentagram of lightning. Swift of Thunder improves in proportion to Dragon Swift's level and does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
This skill is activated when Evan casts Circle of Thunder while Mir is using Dragon Swift.
Required Skill: Swift of Thunder Lv. 20 or higher
Desc.New:
[Fusion Skill] Mir, while using Dragon Swift, responds to Evan's magic and crashes into five different points on the ground, drawing a pentagram of lightning. Swift of Thunder does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
This skill is activated when Evan casts Circle of Thunder while Mir is using Dragon Swift.
Required Skill: Swift of Thunder Lv. 20 or higher
